document.full_text: the chicago blackhawks recorded a 4-3 victory in overtime over the vancouver canucks on sunday to level their best-of-seven series at 3-3 after they had been down 3-0 and facing early elimination.
document.title: hawks and flyers force deciders, predators into second round
lines_and_colors: the chicago blackhawks recorded a 4-3 victory in overtime over the vancouver canucks on sunday to level their best-of-seven series at 3-3 after they had been down 3-0 and facing early elimination.
